about_the_game:
Set in the 19th century in the American West. It's a different Wild West than you have seen before.

Be a lonely cowboy going through a harsh life, avoiding death and fighting starvation, while managing your family’s farm, living the same old life as all of your ancestors… Your soul is different though, it longs for adventure. It's time to change your destiny and seek out something new.

You are no western gun-slinging hero. It won't be easy for you… there are a million ways to die in the west.

You will be able to :

  • Build new buildings and repair old ones: Your gear and animals need shelter, can you provide it?

  • Manage your garden: You can organise and plant your own plants.

  • Avoid outlaws: They want to rob you, kill you, or both. Cowboy must be ready for every eventuality.

  • Move herds of cattle: Travel for long distances to market and sell them to get some cash for saloon pleasures.

  • Travel across an open wild world full of dangers

  • Gather your cowboy equipment and forge unique tools for your Wild West Journey

  • And many more

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590k / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 4GB or Radeon equivalent
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6770K / AMD Ryzen 7 1700x or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 GB or Radeon equivalent
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11

short_description: In the 19th century in the Wild West, you are a poor farmer wanting something more from life: you want an adventure. Sit on a horse and become a Cowboy, unfortunately it won't be that easy because many dangers await on that path and you are no hero yet.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
